channel.title: Home on Urška Košir, DPhil

item.description: 2022 I plan to populate this page with occasional posts, reflections and/or tutorials. Stay tuned, this is work in progress.

item.title: Code
item.description: This website was created in R Studio using Ivy Theme and is deployed using Netlify. https://github.com/rbind/yihui I love the clean look and the simple structure of this site. I am yet to figure out the customizing of domains on Github via personal pages… You can see the code/repository here

item.title: Research Interestes
item.description: Pandemic impact on young Canadians with chronic health conditions In February 2021 I began my postdoc. I work on a large observational multi-wave survey study on COVID-19 impacts. Presently I am analyzing quasi-representative samples from Canada and evaluating the psychological impact of the pandemic on young Canadians with and without chronic health conditions. I am patiently waiting for feedback before I post anything more :) Fertility preservation in young people with cancer in Europe I have started collaborating with Youth Cancer Europe in 2019.
